response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "low", "Being 18 years old is relatively young, but not extremely so."),
    ("gender", "medium", "Male gender is associated with higher recidivism rates."),
    ("ethnicity", "high", "Black individuals often face systemic biases and discrimination that can increase risk factors."),
    ("prior arrests", "high", "Four prior arrests indicate a pattern of criminal behavior."),
    ("convictions", "high", "Having been convicted indicates a history of serious offenses."),
    ("height/weight", "low", "Average height and weight do not significantly impact recidivism risk."),
    ("marital status", "medium", "Never being married can indicate lack of social support."),
    ("living situation", "high", "Living alone can increase isolation and reduce supervision."),
    ("employment", "high", "No jobs during the year suggests economic instability and lack of structure."),
    ("drug use", "low", "No drug use in the past four years is a positive factor."),
    ("mental health", "medium", "Feeling down recently can indicate underlying mental health issues."),
    ("family background", "medium", "Large household size and rural area upbringing can have mixed impacts on recidivism."),
    ("religious beliefs", "low", "Having religious beliefs is generally associated with lower recidivism rates.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 4 times and has been convicted. He is 5 feet 10 inches and weighs 155 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He is enrolled in school at the present moment. He has held no jobs during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 7, in a rural area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
